_comment: English translations for MySQL Cheat Code

mysql.description: MySQL reference. You can find the most commonly used SQL statements here.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: Connecting to MySQL and basic operations

データベース操作.title: Database Operations
データベース操作.description: Create, list, switch, and delete databases
データベース操作.code:
CREATE DATABASE db ;  # Create database
SHOW DATABASES;        # List databases
USE db;                # Switch to db
CONNECT db ;           # Switch to db
DROP DATABASE db;      # Delete db

テーブル操作.title: Table Operations
テーブル操作.description: List, view structure, and delete tables
テーブル操作.code:
SHOW TABLES;           # List tables for current db
SHOW FIELDS FROM t;   # List fields for a table
DESC t;                # Show table structure
SHOW CREATE TABLE t;   # Show create table sql
TRUNCATE TABLE t;      # Remove all data in a table
DROP TABLE t;          # Delete table

プロセス操作.title: Process Operations
プロセス操作.code:
show processlist;  # List processes
kill pid;          # kill process

バックアップの作成.title: Creating Backup
バックアップの作成.code:
# Create a backup
mysqldump -u user -p db_name > db.sql

# Export db without schema
mysqldump -u user -p db_name --no-data=true --add-drop-table=false > db.sql

# Restore a backup
mysql -u user -p db_name < db.sql

テーブルの作成.title: Creating Tables

カラムの削除.title: Dropping Columns
カラムの削除.code: ALTER TABLE t DROP COLUMN c ;

テーブル名の変更.title: Renaming Tables
テーブル名の変更.description: Rename table from t1 to t2
テーブル名の変更.code: ALTER TABLE t1 RENAME TO t2;

カラム名の変更.title: Renaming Columns
カラム名の変更.description: Rename column from c1 to c2
カラム名の変更.code: ALTER TABLE t1 RENAME c1 TO c2 ;

基本的なSELECT.title: Basic SELECT
基本的なSELECT.description: Get data from columns c1, c2

WHERE句でフィルタリング.title: Filtering with WHERE
WHERE句でフィルタリング.code:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
WHERE condition

DISTINCTで重複を除外.title: Exclude Duplicates with DISTINCT
DISTINCTで重複を除外.code:
SELECT DISTINCT c1 FROM t
WHERE condition

ORDER BYでソート.title: Sorting with ORDER BY
ORDER BYでソート.description: Sort result set ascending or descending
ORDER BYでソート.code:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
ORDER BY c1 ASC [DESC]

LIMITとOFFSET.title: LIMIT and OFFSET
LIMITとOFFSET.description: Skip offset rows and return next n rows
LIMITとOFFSET.code:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
ORDER BY c1 
LIMIT n OFFSET offset

GROUP BYでグループ化.title: Grouping with GROUP BY
GROUP BYでグループ化.code:
SELECT c1, aggregate(c2)
FROM t
GROUP BY c1

HAVING句でグループをフィルタ.title: Filtering Groups with HAVING
HAVING句でグループをフィルタ.code:
SELECT c1, aggregate(c2)
FROM t
GROUP BY c1
HAVING condition

INNER JOIN.title: INNER JOIN
INNER JOIN.description: Inner join of t1 and t2
INNER JOIN.code:
SELECT c1, c2 
FROM t1
INNER JOIN t2 ON condition

LEFT JOIN.title: LEFT JOIN
LEFT JOIN.description: Left outer join of t1 and t2
LEFT JOIN.code:
SELECT c1, c2 
FROM t1
LEFT JOIN t2 ON condition

RIGHT JOIN.title: RIGHT JOIN
RIGHT JOIN.description: Right outer join of t1 and t2
RIGHT JOIN.code:
SELECT c1, c2 
FROM t1
RIGHT JOIN t2 ON condition

FULL OUTER JOIN.title: FULL OUTER JOIN
FULL OUTER JOIN.code:
SELECT c1, c2 
FROM t1
FULL OUTER JOIN t2 ON condition

CROSS JOIN.title: CROSS JOIN
CROSS JOIN.description: Generate Cartesian product of table rows
CROSS JOIN.code:
SELECT c1, c2 
FROM t1
CROSS JOIN t2

自己結合.title: Self Join
自己結合.description: Join t1 to itself using INNER JOIN
自己結合.code:
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t1 A
INNER JOIN t1 B ON condition

UNION.title: UNION
UNION.code:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1
UNION [ALL]
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t2

LIKEパターンマッチング.title: LIKE Pattern Matching
LIKEパターンマッチング.code:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1
WHERE c1 [NOT] LIKE pattern

IN句.title: IN Clause
IN句.code:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
WHERE c1 [NOT] IN value_list

BETWEEN句.title: BETWEEN Clause
BETWEEN句.code:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
WHERE  c1 BETWEEN low AND high

NULLチェック.title: NULL Check
NULLチェック.description: Check if value is NULL in table
NULLチェック.code:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
WHERE  c1 IS [NOT] NULL

主キー.title: Primary Key
主キー.description: Set c1 and c2 as primary key

外部キー.title: Foreign Key
外部キー.description: Set c2 column as foreign key

UNIQUE制約.title: UNIQUE Constraint
UNIQUE制約.description: Make c1 and c2 values unique

CHECK制約.title: CHECK Constraint

NOT NULL制約.title: NOT NULL Constraint
NOT NULL制約.description: Set c2 column value as NOT NULL

SELECTからINSERT.title: INSERT from SELECT
SELECTからINSERT.description: Insert rows from t2 to t1

すべての行を更新.title: Updating All Rows
すべての行を更新.description: Update column c1 with new value for all rows

条件付きUPDATE.title: Conditional UPDATE
条件付きUPDATE.description: Update columns c1, c2 matching condition
条件付きUPDATE.code:
UPDATE t
SET c1 = new_value, 
        c2 = new_value
WHERE condition;

条件付きDELETE.title: Conditional DELETE
条件付きDELETE.description: Delete subset of rows in table

ビューの作成.title: Creating Views
ビューの作成.description: Create new view with c1 and c2
ビューの作成.code:
CREATE VIEW v(c1,c2) 
AS
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t;

CHECK OPTION付きビュー.title: View with CHECK OPTION
CHECK OPTION付きビュー.description: Create new view with check option

文字列型.title: String Types
文字列型.code:
# CHAR       - String (0 - 255)
# VARCHAR    - String (0 - 255)
# TINYTEXT   - String (0 - 255)
# TEXT       - String (0 - 65535)
# BLOB       - String (0 - 65535)
# MEDIUMTEXT - String (0 - 16777215)
# MEDIUMBLOB - String (0 - 16777215)
# LONGTEXT   - String (0 - 4294967295)
# LONGBLOB   - String (0 - 4294967295)
# ENUM       - One of preset options
# SET        - Selection of preset options

日付・時刻型.title: Date/Time Types
日付・時刻型.code:
# DATE      - yyyy-MM-dd
# TIME      - hh:mm:ss
# DATETIME  - yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss
# TIMESTAMP - yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss
# YEAR      - yyyy

数値型.title: Numeric Types
数値型.code:
# TINYINT x   - Integer (-128 to 127)
# SMALLINT x  - Integer (-32768 to 32767)
# MEDIUMINT x - Integer (-8388608 to 8388607)
# INT x       - Integer (-2147483648 to 2147483647)
# BIGINT x    - Integer (-9223372036854775808 to 9223372036854775807)
# FLOAT       - Decimal (precise to 23 digits)
# DOUBLE      - Decimal (24 to 53 digits)
# DECIMAL     - "DOUBLE" stored as string

文字列関数.title: String Functions
文字列関数.code:
# CONCAT(), SUBSTRING(), LENGTH(), UPPER(), LOWER()
# REPLACE(), TRIM(), LEFT(), RIGHT(), MID()
# CHAR_LENGTH(), LOCATE(), INSTR(), REVERSE()
# LPAD(), RPAD(), LTRIM(), RTRIM()

日付・時刻関数.title: Date/Time Functions
日付・時刻関数.code:
# NOW(), CURDATE(), CURTIME(), DATE(), TIME()
# DATE_FORMAT(), DATE_ADD(), DATE_SUB()
# DATEDIFF(), TIMEDIFF(), YEAR(), MONTH(), DAY()
# HOUR(), MINUTE(), SECOND(), WEEK(), QUARTER()

数値関数.title: Numeric Functions
数値関数.code:
# ABS(), CEIL(), FLOOR(), ROUND(), TRUNCATE()
# MOD(), POW(), SQRT(), RAND()
# SIN(), COS(), TAN(), LOG(), EXP()

集約関数.title: Aggregate Functions
集約関数.code:
# AVG(), COUNT(), SUM(), MAX(), MIN()
# COUNT(DISTINCT), GROUP_CONCAT()
# STD(), STDDEV(), VARIANCE()

JSON関数.title: JSON Functions
JSON関数.code:
# JSON_ARRAY(), JSON_OBJECT(), JSON_EXTRACT()
# JSON_SET(), JSON_INSERT(), JSON_REPLACE()
# JSON_REMOVE(), JSON_CONTAINS(), JSON_KEYS()
# JSON_LENGTH(), JSON_TYPE(), JSON_VALID()
